fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot a target each night. Deal a basic attack unless your target is role post 5327, in which case deal an unstoppable attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Immune to post 5327 in every way. Post 5327's vote doesn't count against them and none of their attributes, abilities, attacks, or defense will work on this role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that Post 5327 dies before the game ends.
